content:
**About Us**

Welcome to Strickland Plumbing & Maintenance, your trusted partner for all your plumbing needs in Mc Calla, Alabama. With a commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, we provide top-notch services to ensure your home or business runs smoothly. Our team of skilled plumbers is dedicated to delivering prompt, reliable, and professional service, whether you need repairs, installations, or maintenance.

At Strickland Plumbing & Maintenance, we pride ourselves on our 4.6-star rating and 16 glowing reviews. Our working hours are Monday through Friday from 8 AM to 5 PM, and we are closed on Saturdays and Sundays. We are operational and ready to serve you with a smile.

For any plumbing issue, big or small, trust Strickland Plumbing & Maintenance to get the job done right. Contact us today at +1 205-368-0503 to schedule your appointment and experience the difference that comes with choosing a reputable and reliable plumbing service.
